extension.description:
Ads Elite Module

Require Ads Starter Plugin to work.



- Access Module: Extensions >> Module Manager >> Ads Elite
- Copy your AdSense code to Basic Parameters
- Publish/Enable
- Assign to Menu Items
- Save.

( Need Help ? Report a bug ? Request a new feature ? : Click Here - Contact Us )

field.name: @notice_slide
field.description:
Please pay attention !!! :

This ad size cannot display Image/Rich media ads, The Ad Type you will get is Text ads ONLY, even if you choose Image/Rich media ads ad type ( Google AdSense Ad implementation policies )

field.name: @notice_slide2
field.description:
Please pay attention !!! :

This ad size displays ONLY Text ads as a 970 x 90 - Large Leaderboard but Image/Rich media ads JUST as a 728 x 90 - Leaderboard if there is no revelent ads ( Google AdSense Ad implementation policies )

field.name: @notice_slide3
field.description:
Please pay attention !!! :

This ad size displays ONLY Text ads as a 300 x 600 - Large Skyscraper but Image/Rich media ads JUST as a 160 x 600 - Wide Skyscraper if there is no revelent ads or if you put more than one Ad Unit per page ( Google AdSense Ad implementation policies )
